adjective.definition: Free from error; in accordance with fact or truth.
adjective.example: Make sure you give the correct answer.
It was not considered correct behavior.

verb.definition: Tell someone that they are mistaken.
verb.example: He corrected me on a point of law.

noun.definition: The action or process of correcting something.
noun.example: The correction of the manuscript took weeks.

noun.definition: A change that rectifies an error or inaccuracy.
noun.example: He made a correction to his statement.

usage_examples: I need to correct the spelling mistakes.
